verses.roman:
kriyā-śakti-pradhāna saṅkarṣaṇa balarāma
prākṛtāprākṛta-sṛṣṭi karena nirmāṇa

synonyms: kriyā-śakti-pradhāna—the predominator of the creative energy; saṅkarṣaṇa—Lord Saṅkarṣaṇa; balarāma—Lord Balarāma; prākṛta—material; aprākṛta—spiritual; sṛṣṭi—worlds; karena—does; nirmāṇa—creation.
translation: "Lord Saṅkarṣaṇa is Lord Balarāma. Being the predominator of the creative energy, He creates both the material and spiritual worlds.
